newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritian rupee strengthes against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Mauritian rupee strengthes against dollar.

text.p: The Mauritian ruppe strengthened slightly against the dollar and weakened against the pound sterling on Monday, reflecting international market trends.
The rupee was quoted at a mean commercial rate of 21.7435 to the dollar from 21.844 on Friday and at 35.0855 to the pound from 34.787.
